p: Toxic activity in the serum was detected in 65 and 73 sera from Greece and Cyprus, respectively; therefore calculations were done on the basis of 1,185 and 369 sera of Greece and Cyprus, respectively. As previously shown [ 26, 27], a cut-off titre ≥ 20-when used for 1000TCID 50 inoculum, is equivalent to a cut-off titre ≥ 40 when a 100 TCID 50 is used [ 28].
